oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Remington Model 51 semi-automatic pistol and holster
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This Model 51 pistol is stamped on the left side of the frame just above the trigger housing "PA 14288." The bolt is stamped "380 CAL" which is visible at the ejection port. The black hard rubber grips are marked "REMINGTON / UMC." The leather holster was made by "Brauer Bros. MFG. CO., St. Louis." It may have been carried by James McFerren Johnston during WW I. Pvt. James McFerren Johnston served in HC Co., Ord. Corps, attached to the 114th MG Battn., 30th Div.
